  • Ôn lại các từ vựng về sản xuất và kho bãi

docs.title: 📊 6. Progress Check
docs.text:
Tự đánh giá: - □ Tôi có thể nói tên 20+ từ vựng về thành phố và đường phố - □ Tôi hiểu được cách hỏi đường và chỉ đường - □ Tôi có thể đọc hiểu bản đồ và hướng dẫn đi lại - □ Tôi biết cách mô tả vị trí và hướng dẫn di chuyển

Điểm mạnh: __ Cần cải thiện: __ Kế hoạch ôn tập: ____

Chúc bạn học tập hiệu quả và navigate the city with confidence! Hẹn gặp lại ở Day 51: Industrial & Warehouses! 🏙️🚗

docs.title: Day 51: Industrial & Warehouses (Khu công nghiệp & Kho bãi)
Day 51: Industrial & Warehouses (Khu công nghiệp & Kho bãi)
docs.text: Chào mừng bạn đến với Ngày 51! Hôm nay chúng ta tiếp tục PHASE 5: PLACES & SURROUNDINGS với chủ đề Industrial & Warehouses (Khu công nghiệp & Kho bãi). Bài học này cung cấp từ vựng về môi trường công nghiệp, kho bãi và hoạt động logistics. Trong TOEIC, chủ đề này thường xuất hiện trong Part 1 (hoạt động kho bãi), Part 3-4 (thảo luận về sản xuất, vận chuyển) và Part 7 (báo cáo sản xuất, đơn hàng).

docs.title: 🎯 Mục tiêu bài học
docs.text:
• Nắm vững 60+ từ vựng về khu công nghiệp, kho bãi và hoạt động logistics.
  • Luyện nghe (Listening): Hiểu các đoạn hội thoại về sản xuất, vận chuyển hàng hóa (Part 3-4).
  • Luyện đọc (Reading): Đọc hiểu báo cáo kho bãi, đơn đặt hàng, hướng dẫn an toàn (Part 7).
  • Ngữ pháp: Ôn tập Passive voice trong sản xuất và Present Perfect cho hoạt động hoàn thành.

docs.title: ⏰ Phân bổ thời gian (1.5 - 2 giờ)
docs.text:
1. Từ vựng (30 phút): Học từ mới về công nghiệp và kho bãi.
  2. TOEIC Insights (10 phút): Các dạng bài liên quan đến industrial.
  3. Luyện tập (40 phút): Làm bài tập Part 1, 3-4, 7.
  4. Review & Homework (10 phút): Tổng kết và bài tập về nhà.

docs.title: a. Khu công nghiệp (Industrial Areas)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ industry /ˈɪn.də.stri/ (n) công nghiệp The automotive industry is growing rapidly. industrial /ɪnˈdʌs.tri.əl/ (adj) thuộc công nghiệp Industrial areas are located outside cities. factory /ˈfæk.tər.i/ (n) nhà máy The factory produces electronic components. plant /plænt/ (n) nhà máy The manufacturing plant operates 24/7. facility /fəˈsɪl.ə.t̬i/ (n) cơ sở The production facility meets safety standards. complex /kəmˈpleks/ (n) khu phức hợp The industrial complex houses multiple companies. site /saɪt/ (n) địa điểm The construction site will become a factory. zone /zoʊn/ (n) khu vực The free trade zone attracts investors. park /pɑːrk/ (n) khu (công nghiệp) The technology park hosts startups. compound /ˈkɑːm.paʊnd/ (n) khu hợp The factory compound includes offices. premises /ˈprem.ə.səz/ (n) khuôn viên Security guards patrol the premises. operation /ˌɑː.pəˈreɪ.ʃən/ (n) hoạt động Daily operations run smoothly.

docs.title: b. Kho bãi & Lưu trữ (Warehouses & Storage)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ warehouse /ˈwer.haʊs/ (n) kho hàng The warehouse stores finished products. storage /ˈstɔːr.ɪdʒ/ (n) kho, lưu trữ Cold storage preserves perishable goods. depot /ˈdiː.poʊ/ (n) kho tổng The distribution depot serves the region. stockroom /ˈstɑːk.ruːm/ (n) phòng kho Employees access the stockroom daily. storeroom /ˈstɔːr.ruːm/ (n) phòng lưu trữ The storeroom holds office supplies. inventory /ˈɪn.vən.tɔːr.i/ (n) hàng tồn kho Monthly inventory counts ensure accuracy. stock /stɑːk/ (n) hàng tồn Check stock levels before ordering. goods /ɡʊdz/ (n) hàng hóa Imported goods arrive weekly. merchandise /ˈmɜːr.tʃən.daɪs/ (n) hàng hóa Retail merchandise fills the shelves. cargo /ˈkɑːr.ɡoʊ/ (n) hàng hóa vận chuyển Cargo ships transport containers globally. freight /freɪt/ (n) hàng vận tải Freight trains carry heavy loads. shipment /ˈʃɪp.mənt/ (n) lô hàng The shipment arrived on schedule. delivery /dɪˈlɪv.ər.i/ (n) giao hàng Same-day delivery costs extra. distribution /ˌdɪs.trəˈbjuː.ʃən/ (n) phân phối Efficient distribution reduces costs. logistics /ləˈdʒɪs.tɪks/ (n) hậu cần Supply chain logistics are complex.

docs.title: c. Thiết bị & Máy móc (Equipment & Machinery)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ equipment /ɪˈkwɪp.mənt/ (n) thiết bị Heavy equipment requires trained operators. machinery /məˈʃiː.nər.i/ (n) máy móc Industrial machinery needs regular maintenance. machine /məˈʃiːn/ (n) máy The packaging machine runs automatically. forklift /ˈfɔːrk.lɪft/ (n) xe nâng Forklift operators need certification. crane /kreɪn/ (n) cần cẩu Tower cranes lift heavy materials. conveyor /kənˈveɪ.ɚ/ (n) băng tải Products move on conveyor belts. loader /ˈloʊ.dɚ/ (n) máy xúc lật The loader moves bulk materials. truck /trʌk/ (n) xe tải Delivery trucks transport goods. trailer /ˈtreɪ.lɚ/ (n) rơ-moóc Semi-trailers carry large loads. container /kənˈteɪ.nɚ/ (n) thùng container Shipping containers stack efficiently. pallet /ˈpæl.ət/ (n) pallet gỗ Goods are stacked on pallets. cart /kɑːrt/ (n) xe đẩy Hand carts move smaller items. dolly /ˈdɑː.li/ (n) xe đẩy bánh xe Use a dolly for heavy boxes. scale /skeɪl/ (n) cân Digital scales weigh shipments accurately. scanner /ˈskæn.ɚ/ (n) máy quét Barcode scanners track inventory.

docs.title: d. Hoạt động & Quy trình (Operations & Processes)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ loading /ˈloʊ.dɪŋ/ (n) xếp hàng Loading takes two hours daily. unloading /ʌnˈloʊ.dɪŋ/ (n) dỡ hàng Unloading requires careful handling. packing /ˈpæk.ɪŋ/ (n) đóng gói Proper packing prevents damage. unpacking /ʌnˈpæk.ɪŋ/ (n) mở gói Unpacking reveals any damage. sorting /ˈsɔːr.t̬ɪŋ/ (n) phân loại Automated sorting improves efficiency. labeling /ˈleɪ.bəl.ɪŋ/ (n) dán nhãn Accurate labeling prevents mistakes. shipping /ˈʃɪp.ɪŋ/ (n) vận chuyển Express shipping costs more. receiving /rɪˈsiː.vɪŋ/ (n) tiếp nhận The receiving dock stays busy. handling /ˈhænd.lɪŋ/ (n) xử lý Careful handling prevents breakage. processing /ˈprɑː.ses.ɪŋ/ (n) xử lý Order processing takes 24 hours. assembly /əˈsem.bli/ (n) lắp ráp Final assembly completes production. quality control /ˈkwɑː.lə.t̬i kənˌtroʊl/ (n) kiểm soát chất lượng Quality control ensures standards. inspection /ɪnˈspek.ʃən/ (n) kiểm tra Daily inspections maintain safety. maintenance /ˈmeɪn.t̬ən.əns/ (n) bảo trì Preventive maintenance reduces downtime.

docs.title: e. An toàn & Nhân viên (Safety & Personnel)

Day 52: Construction Sites (Công trường xây dựng)
docs.text: Chào mừng bạn đến với Ngày 52! Hôm nay chúng ta tiếp tục PHASE 5: PLACES & SURROUNDINGS với chủ đề Construction Sites (Công trường xây dựng). Bài học này cung cấp từ vựng về hoạt động xây dựng, vật liệu, thiết bị và an toàn lao động. Trong TOEIC, chủ đề này thường xuất hiện trong Part 1 (hoạt động xây dựng), Part 3-4 (thảo luận về dự án, tiến độ) và Part 7 (báo cáo tiến độ, hợp đồng xây dựng).

docs.title: 🎯 Mục tiêu bài học
docs.text:
• Nắm vững 60+ từ vựng về xây dựng, vật liệu, thiết bị và an toàn công trình.
  • Luyện nghe (Listening): Hiểu các đoạn hội thoại về dự án xây dựng, tiến độ công trình (Part 3-4).
  • Luyện đọc (Reading): Đọc hiểu báo cáo tiến độ, hợp đồng, hướng dẫn an toàn (Part 7).
  • Ngữ pháp: Ôn tập Future Continuous cho kế hoạch xây dựng và Present Perfect Continuous cho tiến độ.

docs.title: a. Xây dựng & Dự án (Construction & Projects)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ construction /kənˈstrʌk.ʃən/ (n) xây dựng Construction begins next month. building /ˈbɪl.dɪŋ/ (n/v) tòa nhà/xây dựng They're building a new office complex. project /ˈprɑː.dʒekt/ (n) dự án The construction project takes two years. site /saɪt/ (n) công trường The construction site is well-organized. development /dɪˈvel.əp.mənt/ (n) dự án phát triển The housing development has 200 units. renovation /ˌren.əˈveɪ.ʃən/ (n) cải tạo Office renovation improves workspace. demolition /ˌdem.əˈlɪʃ.ən/ (n) phá dỡ Demolition starts before new construction. foundation /faʊnˈdeɪ.ʃən/ (n) nền móng Strong foundations support tall buildings. structure /ˈstrʌk.tʃɚ/ (n) cấu trúc The steel structure rises quickly. framework /ˈfreɪm.wɜːrk/ (n) khung xương Workers install the building framework. blueprint /ˈbluː.prɪnt/ (n) bản thiết kế Architects review construction blueprints. design /dɪˈzaɪn/ (n/v) thiết kế The design meets safety standards. plan /plæn/ (n/v) kế hoạch Construction plans require city approval. permit /pɚˈmɪt/ (n/v) giấy phép Building permits ensure code compliance. contract /ˈkɑːn.trækt/ (n) hợp đồng The construction contract specifies deadlines.

docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ worker /ˈwɜːr.kɚ/ (n) công nhân Construction workers start at dawn. contractor /ˈkɑːn.træk.tɚ/ (n) nhà thầu The contractor manages multiple projects. builder /ˈbɪl.dɚ/ (n) thợ xây Experienced builders work efficiently. engineer /ˌen.dʒəˈnɪr/ (n) kỹ sư Structural engineers ensure safety. architect /ˈɑːr.kə.tekt/ (n) kiến trúc sư The architect designs beautiful buildings. supervisor /ˈsuː.pɚˌvaɪ.zɚ/ (n) giám sát viên Site supervisors coordinate activities. foreman /ˈfɔːr.mən/ (n) đội trưởng The foreman assigns daily tasks. carpenter /ˈkɑːr.pən.tɚ/ (n) thợ mộc Skilled carpenters install wooden frames. electrician /ɪˌlek.ˈtrɪʃ.ən/ (n) thợ điện Licensed electricians wire new buildings. plumber /ˈplʌm.ɚ/ (n) thợ sửa ống nước Plumbers install water systems. mason /ˈmeɪ.sən/ (n) thợ xây Stone masons build decorative walls. painter /ˈpeɪn.t̬ɚ/ (n) thợ sơn Professional painters finish interior walls. roofer /ˈruː.fɚ/ (n) thợ lợp mái Roofers work in dangerous conditions. welder /ˈwel.dɚ/ (n) thợ hàn Certified welders join steel beams.

Bài học này cung cấp từ vựng về quy trình sản xuất, kiểm soát chất lượng và quản lý nhà máy. Trong TOEIC, chủ đề này thường xuất hiện trong Part 1 (hoạt động sản xuất), Part 3-4 (thảo luận về sản lượng, chất lượng) và Part 7 (báo cáo sản xuất, đơn đặt hàng).

docs.title: 🎯 Mục tiêu bài học
docs.text:
• Nắm vững 60+ từ vựng về nhà máy, quy trình sản xuất và kiểm soát chất lượng.
  • Luyện nghe (Listening): Hiểu các đoạn hội thoại về sản xuất, chất lượng sản phẩm (Part 3-4).
  • Luyện đọc (Reading): Đọc hiểu báo cáo sản xuất, quy trình chất lượng (Part 7).
  • Ngữ pháp: Ôn tập Passive voice trong sản xuất và Present Perfect cho kết quả đạt được.

docs.title: ⏰ Phân bổ thời gian (1.5 - 2 giờ)
docs.text:
1. Từ vựng (30 phút): Học từ mới về nhà máy và sản xuất.
  2. TOEIC Insights (10 phút): Các dạng bài liên quan đến manufacturing.
  3. Luyện tập (40 phút): Làm bài tập Part 1, 3-4, 7.
  4. Review & Homework (10 phút): Tổng kết và bài tập về nhà.

docs.title: a. Nhà máy & Sản xuất (Factory & Production)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ factory /ˈfæk.tər.i/ (n) nhà máy The car factory produces 1000 vehicles daily. plant /plænt/ (n) nhà máy The manufacturing plant operates 24/7. mill /mɪl/ (n) nhà máy (giấy, thép) The steel mill employs 500 workers. facility /fəˈsɪl.ə.t̬i/ (n) cơ sở sản xuất Our production facility meets ISO standards. workshop /ˈwɜːrk.ʃɑːp/ (n) xưởng The repair workshop fixes machinery. production /prəˈdʌk.ʃən/ (n) sản xuất Monthly production exceeded targets. manufacturing /ˌmæn.jəˈfæk.tʃər.ɪŋ/ (n) chế tạo Advanced manufacturing uses robotics. assembly /əˈsem.bli/ (n) lắp ráp Final assembly completes the product. processing /ˈprɑː.ses.ɪŋ/ (n) xử lý Food processing requires strict hygiene. operation /ˌɑː.pəˈreɪ.ʃən/ (n) hoạt động Factory operations run smoothly. output /ˈaʊt.pʊt/ (n) sản lượng Daily output increased by 15%. capacity /kəˈpæs.ə.t̬i/ (n) năng suất Factory capacity is 10,000 units monthly. productivity /ˌproʊ.dʌkˈtɪv.ə.t̬i/ (n) năng suất lao động New equipment improves worker productivity. efficiency /ɪˈfɪʃ.ən.si/ (n) hiệu suất Automation increases operational efficiency.

docs.title: b. Quy trình sản xuất (Production Process)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ process /ˈprɑː.ses/ (n/v) quy trình/xử lý The production process has five stages. procedure /prəˈsiː.dʒɚ/ (n) thủ tục Follow safety procedures at all times. method /ˈmeθ.əd/ (n) phương pháp New methods reduce production time. technique /tekˈniːk/ (n) kỹ thuật Advanced techniques improve quality. stage /steɪdʒ/ (n) giai đoạn Each production stage requires inspection. step /step/ (n) bước The process has ten sequential steps. phase /feɪz/ (n) pha We're in the final production phase. cycle /ˈsaɪ.kəl/ (n) chu kỳ The manufacturing cycle takes six hours. workflow /ˈwɜːrk.floʊ/ (n) luồng công việc Optimized workflow reduces bottlenecks. sequence /ˈsiː.kwəns/ (n) trình tự Follow the correct assembly sequence. schedule /ˈskedʒ.uːl/ (n/v) lịch trình Production runs on a tight schedule. batch /bætʃ/ (n) lô Each batch undergoes quality testing. lot /lɑːt/ (n) lô hàng This lot meets specifications. run /rʌn/ (n) đợt sản xuất The production run lasted 12 hours.

docs.title: c. Thiết bị & Máy móc (Equipment & Machinery)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ equipment /ɪˈkwɪp.mənt/ (n) thiết bị Modern equipment increases efficiency. machinery /məˈʃiː.nər.i/ (n) máy móc Heavy machinery requires skilled operators. machine /məˈʃiːn/ (n) máy The packaging machine works automatically. robot /ˈroʊ.bɑːt/ (n) robot Industrial robots perform precise tasks. automation /ˌɔː.təˈmeɪ.ʃən/ (n) tự động hóa Factory automation reduces labor costs. conveyor /kənˈveɪ.ɚ/ (n) băng tải Products move on conveyor belts. assembly line /əˈsem.bli laɪn/ (n) dây chuyền lắp ráp Workers stand along the assembly line. production line /prəˈdʌk.ʃən laɪn/ (n) dây chuyền sản xuất The production line operates continuously. tool /tuːl/ (n) công cụ Precision tools ensure accurate assembly. device /dɪˈvaɪs/ (n) thiết bị Measuring devices monitor quality. instrument /ˈɪn.strə.mənt/ (n) dụng cụ Scientific instruments test materials. computer /kəmˈpjuː.t̬ɚ/ (n) máy tính Computers control manufacturing processes. software /ˈsɔːft.wer/ (n) phần mềm Production software tracks inventory. system /ˈsɪs.təm/ (n) hệ thống The control system monitors operations.

docs.title: d. Kiểm soát chất lượng (Quality Control)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ quality /ˈkwɑː.lə.t̬i/ (n) chất lượng Product quality exceeds industry standards. control /kənˈtroʊl/ (n/v) kiểm soát Quality control prevents defects. inspection /ɪnˈspek.ʃən/ (n) kiểm tra Regular inspections ensure standards. testing /ˈtes.t̬ɪŋ/ (n) thử nghiệm Material testing confirms specifications. standard /ˈstæn.dɚd/ (n) tiêu chuẩn Products meet international standards. specification /ˌspes.ə.fəˈkeɪ.ʃən/ (n) thông số kỹ thuật Check specifications before production. requirement /rɪˈkwaɪɚ.mənt/ (n) yêu cầu Customer requirements guide production. tolerance /ˈtɑː.lɚ.əns/ (n) dung sai Manufacturing tolerance is 0.1mm. defect /ˈdiː.fekt/ (n) khiếm khuyết Zero defects is our quality goal. flaw /flɔː/ (n) lỗi Inspectors identify product flaws. error /ˈer.ɚ/ (n) lỗi Human errors cause production delays. reject /rɪˈdʒekt/ (v/n) từ chối/hàng loại Rejected products are recycled. approval /əˈpruː.vəl/ (n) phê duyệt Final approval comes from quality manager. certification /ˌsɝː.t̬ə.fəˈkeɪ.ʃən/ (n) chứng nhận ISO certification ensures quality systems.

docs.title: e. Nhân viên & Tổ chức (Personnel & Organization)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ worker /ˈwɜːr.kɚ/ (n) công nhân Skilled workers maintain equipment. employee /ɪmˈplɔɪ.iː/ (n) nhân viên Factory employees receive safety training. operator /ˈɑː.pəˌreɪ.t̬ɚ/ (n) người vận hành Machine operators monitor production. technician /tekˈnɪʃ.ən/ (n) kỹ thuật viên Maintenance technicians service equipment. engineer /ˌen.dʒəˈnɪr/ (n) kỹ sư Process engineers optimize workflows. supervisor /ˈsuː.pɚˌvaɪ.zɚ/ (n) giám sát viên Shift supervisors coordinate activities. manager /ˈmæn.ə.dʒɚ/ (n) quản lý Plant managers oversee operations. foreman /ˈfɔːr.mən/ (n) đội trưởng The foreman assigns daily tasks. inspector /ɪnˈspek.tɚ/ (n) thanh tra viên Quality inspectors check every product. specialist /ˈspeʃ.əl.ɪst/ (n) chuyên gia Safety specialists conduct training. team /tiːm/ (n) đội nhóm Production teams work in shifts. crew /kruː/ (n) tổ Night crews maintain machinery. shift /ʃɪft/ (n) ca làm việc The factory runs three daily shifts. department /dɪˈpɑːrt.mənt/ (n) phòng ban Quality department reports to management.

docs.title: 🔍 2. TOEIC Insights - Chủ điểm thường gặp
Part 1 (Photographs)
docs.text:
Các tình huống phổ biến: - Công nhân đang làm việc trên dây chuyền - Máy móc đang hoạt động sản xuất - Sản phẩm được kiểm tra chất lượng

Từ vựng hay gặp: 

• Workers are operating machinery on the factory floor.
• Products are moving along the assembly line.
• Technicians are inspecting manufactured goods.
• Equipment is being maintained by specialists.

docs.title: Part 3-4 (Conversations & Talks)
docs.text: Chủ đề thường gặp: - Thảo luận về sản lượng và mục tiêu - Vấn đề chất lượng và cải tiến - Lịch trình sản xuất và giao hàng - An toàn và bảo trì thiết bị

docs.title: Part 7 (Reading)
docs.text: Dạng văn bản: - Báo cáo sản xuất hàng tháng - Quy trình kiểm soát chất lượng - Hướng dẫn vận hành thiết bị - Email về đơn hàng và giao hàng

docs.title: Production Process
docs.text: Cụm từ Nghĩa Ví dụ mass production sản xuất hàng loạt Mass production reduces unit costs. lean manufacturing sản xuất tinh gọn Lean manufacturing eliminates waste. just-in-time đúng lúc Just-in-time delivery reduces inventory. assembly line dây chuyền lắp ráp Assembly lines increase efficiency. production capacity năng lực sản xuất We're operating at full capacity. meet demand đáp ứng nhu cầu Increase output to meet demand.

docs.title: Quality Management
docs.text: Cụm từ Nghĩa Ví dụ quality assurance đảm bảo chất lượng Quality assurance prevents defects. quality control kiểm soát chất lượng Strict quality control maintains standards. continuous improvement cải tiến liên tục Continuous improvement increases efficiency. zero defects không khiếm khuyết Our goal is zero defects. meet specifications đáp ứng thông số All products must meet specifications. pass inspection vượt qua kiểm tra Products must pass final inspection.

docs.title: Operations Management
docs.text: Cụm từ Nghĩa Ví dụ optimize operations tối ưu hóa hoạt động New software optimizes factory operations. reduce downtime giảm thời gian ngừng Preventive maintenance reduces downtime. increase productivity tăng năng suất Training programs increase worker productivity. control costs kiểm soát chi phí Efficient processes help control costs. maintain equipment bảo trì thiết bị Regular maintenance prevents breakdowns.

docs.title: Exercise A: Manufacturing Vocabulary
docs.text: Match the production terms with their definitions: 1. assembly line - a. acceptable variation from standard 2. quality control - b. systematic process monitoring 3. batch - c. sequential production system 4. tolerance - d. group of products made together 5. automation - e. use of machines without human control

docs.title: Exercise B: Production Meeting
docs.text:
Complete the conversation about factory operations:

Manager: How is this month's _ going? Supervisor: We're _ our targets. Daily _ is up 12%. Manager: Excellent! Any _ _ issues? Supervisor: Minor. We've rejected only 0.2% of products. Manager: Good. What about _ _? Supervisor: All machines are running smoothly. The new _ system prevents breakdowns. Manager: Perfect. Let's _ this _ for next quarter.

docs.title: Exercise C: TOEIC Part 7 Practice
docs.text:
Read the production report and answer the questions:

MONTHLY PRODUCTION REPORT Electro Components Manufacturing March 2024

PRODUCTION SUMMARY: Target: 50,000 units Actual: 52,500 units Achievement: 105% of target

QUALITY METRICS: - Defect rate: 0.15% (Target: <0.2%) - Customer complaints: 2 (Target: <5) - Rework rate: 0.8% (Target: <1.0%) - First-pass yield: 99.2%

EFFICIENCY INDICATORS: - Equipment uptime: 96.5% - Labor productivity: +8% vs. last month - Energy consumption: -5% per unit - Waste reduction: 12% vs. previous month

SAFETY PERFORMANCE: - Accident-free days: 30 - Safety training hours: 240 - Near-miss reports: 3 (all addressed) - Safety compliance: 100%

DELIVERY PERFORMANCE: - On-time shipments: 98.5% - Order fulfillment rate: 99.2% - Customer satisfaction: 4.8/5.0

CHALLENGES & ACTIONS: Issue: Supplier delay for Component X Action: Alternative supplier identified Timeline: Resolved by April 5th

Issue: Machine #3 maintenance due Action: Scheduled for weekend Impact: No production disruption expected

NEXT MONTH TARGETS: - Increase production to 55,000 units - Reduce defect rate to <0.12% - Achieve 97% equipment uptime - Complete ISO 9001 audit preparation

Questions: 1. What was the actual production achievement percentage? 2. How many accident-free days did the factory achieve? 3. What is the target defect rate for next month?

docs.title: a. Đồ nội thất (Furniture)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ chair /tʃer/ (n) ghế The woman is sitting on a chair. table /ˈteɪ.bəl/ (n) bàn Papers are scattered on the table. desk /desk/ (n) bàn làm việc A computer is placed on the desk. bench /bentʃ/ (n) ghế dài People are sitting on the bench. stool /stuːl/ (n) ghế đẩu Bar stools line the counter. sofa /ˈsoʊ.fə/ (n) ghế sofa The sofa faces the television. couch /kaʊtʃ/ (n) ghế dài Cushions are arranged on the couch. shelf /ʃelf/ (n) kệ Books are displayed on shelves. cabinet /ˈkæb.ə.nət/ (n) tủ Files are stored in the cabinet. drawer /drɔːr/ (n) ngăn kéo The drawer is partially open. wardrobe /ˈwɔːr.droʊb/ (n) tủ quần áo Clothes hang in the wardrobe. bookcase /ˈbʊk.keɪs/ (n) tủ sách The bookcase is filled with novels. counter /ˈkaʊn.t̬ɚ/ (n) quầy Items are displayed on the counter.

docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ computer /kəmˈpjuː.t̬ɚ/ (n) máy tính The computer screen shows data. laptop /ˈlæp.tɑːp/ (n) máy tính xách tay She's typing on her laptop. keyboard /ˈkiː.bɔːrd/ (n) bàn phím Fingers are moving across the keyboard. mouse /maʊs/ (n) chuột máy tính The mouse is beside the keyboard. monitor /ˈmɑː.nə.t̬ɚ/ (n) màn hình Two monitors display different programs. printer /ˈprɪn.t̬ɚ/ (n) máy in Documents are coming from the printer. scanner /ˈskæn.ɚ/ (n) máy quét Photos are being scanned. telephone /ˈtel.ə.foʊn/ (n) điện thoại The telephone is ringing. phone /foʊn/ (n) điện thoại She's talking on the phone. calculator /ˈkæl.kjə.leɪ.t̬ɚ/ (n) máy tính Numbers are entered into the calculator. stapler /ˈsteɪ.plɚ/ (n) máy bấm ghim Papers are fastened with a stapler. scissors /ˈsɪz.ɚz/ (n) kéo Scissors cut through the paper. pen /pen/ (n) bút He's writing with a pen. pencil /ˈpen.səl/ (n) bút chì The pencil needs sharpening. paper /ˈpeɪ.pɚ/ (n) giấy Sheets of paper cover the desk. file /faɪl/ (n) hồ sơ Files are organized in folders. folder /ˈfoʊl.dɚ/ (n) thư mục Documents are kept in folders. notebook /ˈnoʊt.bʊk/ (n) sổ ghi chép Notes are written in the notebook.

docs.title: d. Phương tiện & Xe cộ (Vehicles & Transportation)

docs.title: 🔍 2. TOEIC Part 1 Strategy - Mô tả đồ vật
Các cấu trúc mô tả thường gặp:
docs.text:
1. Vị trí của đồ vật: 

• The computer is on the desk.
• Books are placed on the shelf.
• A lamp sits beside the chair.
• Papers are scattered across the table.

2. Trạng thái của đồ vật: 

• The door is open/closed.
• Lights are turned on/off.
• The phone is ringing.
• The printer is operating.

3. Số lượng và sắp xếp: 

• Several chairs are arranged in rows.
• Multiple computers line the desks.
• Various tools hang on the wall.
• Numerous files fill the cabinet.

docs.title: DO:

docs.title: a. Hành động cơ bản (Basic Actions)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ walk /wɔːk/ (v) đi bộ She is walking to the office. run /rʌn/ (v) chạy People are running in the park. sit /sɪt/ (v) ngồi He is sitting at his desk. stand /stænd/ (v) đứng They are standing in line. lie /laɪ/ (v) nằm The man is lying on the bench. sleep /sliːp/ (v) ngủ The child is sleeping peacefully. eat /iːt/ (v) ăn She is eating lunch at her desk. drink /drɪŋk/ (v) uống He is drinking coffee from a cup. talk /tɔːk/ (v) nói chuyện They are talking on the phone. speak /spiːk/ (v) nói She is speaking to a colleague. listen /ˈlɪs.ən/ (v) nghe He is listening to music. look /lʊk/ (v) nhìn She is looking at the documents. watch /wɑːtʃ/ (v) xem They are watching a presentation. see /siː/ (v) thấy I can see people crossing the street.

docs.title: b. Hành động văn phòng (Office Actions)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ work /wɜːrk/ (v) làm việc She is working on her computer. type /taɪp/ (v) đánh máy He is typing an email. write /raɪt/ (v) viết She is writing notes in a notebook. read /riːd/ (v) đọc He is reading a report. print /prɪnt/ (v) in Documents are being printed. copy /ˈkɑː.pi/ (v) sao chép She is copying important files. scan /skæn/ (v) quét He is scanning documents. file /faɪl/ (v) lưu trữ Papers are being filed alphabetically. organize /ˈɔːr.ɡən.aɪz/ (v) sắp xếp She is organizing her desk. sort /sɔːrt/ (v) phân loại He is sorting through emails. calculate /ˈkæl.kjə.leɪt/ (v) tính toán She is calculating the expenses. sign /saɪn/ (v) ký He is signing the contract. present /prɪˈzent/ (v) thuyết trình She is presenting the quarterly results. discuss /dɪˈskʌs/ (v) thảo luận They are discussing the project. meet /miːt/ (v) họp The team is meeting in the conference room. interview /ˈɪn.t̬ɚ.vjuː/ (v) phỏng vấn She is interviewing job candidates.

docs.title: c. Hành động di chuyển (Movement Actions)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ enter /ˈen.t̬ɚ/ (v) vào People are entering the building. exit /ˈeɡ.zɪt/ (v) ra They are exiting through the main door. leave /liːv/ (v) rời khỏi She is leaving the office. arrive /əˈraɪv/ (v) đến The train is arriving at the station. depart /dɪˈpɑːrt/ (v) khởi hành The flight is departing on time. climb /klaɪm/ (v) leo Workers are climbing the ladder. descend /dɪˈsend/ (v) xuống People are descending the stairs. cross /krɔːs/ (v) băng qua Pedestrians are crossing the street. pass /pæs/ (v) đi qua Cars are passing through the tunnel. approach /əˈproʊtʃ/ (v) đến gần The woman is approaching the counter. follow /ˈfɑː.loʊ/ (v) theo sau Children are following their teacher. lead /liːd/ (v) dẫn đầu The guide is leading the tour group. turn /tɜːrn/ (v) quay She is turning toward the camera. bend /bend/ (v) cúi He is bending over to pick up papers. reach /riːtʃ/ (v) với tay lấy She is reaching for a book on the shelf.

docs.title: d. Hành động tương tác (Interactive Actions)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ shake hands /ʃeɪk hændz/ (v) bắt tay They are shaking hands in greeting. wave /weɪv/ (v) vẫy tay She is waving goodbye. point /pɔɪnt/ (v) chỉ He is pointing at the chart. gesture /ˈdʒes.tʃɚ/ (v) ra hiệu She is gesturing during her speech. nod /nɑːd/ (v) gật đầu He is nodding in agreement. smile /smaɪl/ (v) mỉm cười Everyone is smiling for the photo. laugh /læf/ (v) cười They are laughing at the joke. clap /klæp/ (v) vỗ tay The audience is clapping enthusiastically. hug /hʌɡ/ (v) ôm Old friends are hugging each other. kiss /kɪs/ (v) hôn The couple is kissing goodbye. hold /hoʊld/ (v) cầm She is holding a bouquet of flowers. carry /ˈker.i/ (v) mang He is carrying a briefcase. lift /lɪft/ (v) nâng Workers are lifting heavy boxes. push /pʊʃ/ (v) đẩy She is pushing the shopping cart. pull /pʊl/ (v) kéo He is pulling the suitcase behind him.

docs.title: e. Hành động chăm sóc & Dịch vụ (Care & Service Actions)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ serve /sɜːrv/ (v) phục vụ The waiter is serving customers. help /help/ (v) giúp đỡ She is helping a colleague. assist /əˈsɪst/ (v) hỗ trợ Staff are assisting visitors. clean /kliːn/ (v) dọn dẹp Janitors are cleaning the floors. wash /wɑːʃ/ (v) rửa She is washing her hands. sweep /swiːp/ (v) quét Workers are sweeping the sidewalk. repair /rɪˈper/ (v) sửa chữa Technicians are repairing equipment. fix /fɪks/ (v) sửa He is fixing the broken printer. build /bɪld/ (v) xây dựng Construction workers are building a wall. paint /peɪnt/ (v) sơn Painters are painting the exterior. install /ɪnˈstɔːl/ (v) lắp đặt Technicians are installing new software. replace /rɪˈpleɪs/ (v) thay thế They are replacing old equipment. maintain /meɪnˈteɪn/ (v) bảo trì Staff are maintaining the machinery. operate /ˈɑː.pɚ.eɪt/ (v) vận hành She is operating the copy machine.

docs.title: 🔍 2. Grammar Focus: Present Continuous vs Present Simple
Present Continuous (Hiện tại tiếp diễn) - Dùng trong Part 1
docs.text:
Cấu trúc: Subject + am/is/are + V-ing

Dùng để mô tả: - Hành động đang diễn ra tại thời điểm nói - Những gì nhìn thấy trong hình ảnh Part 1

Ví dụ: 

✅ She is typing on her computer. (Cô ấy đang đánh máy)
✅ They are walking across the bridge. (Họ đang đi qua cầu)
✅ The man is reading a newspaper. (Người đàn ông đang đọc báo)

docs.title: Present Simple (Hiện tại đơn) - Ít dùng trong Part 1
docs.text:
Cấu trúc: Subject + V(s/es)

Dùng để mô tả: - Thói quen, sự thật hiển nhiên - Trạng thái không thay đổi

Ví dụ: 

✅ The sign says "EXIT." (Biển báo ghi "THOÁT")
✅ This building has five floors. (Tòa nhà này có 5 tầng)

docs.title: 🔍 3. TOEIC Part 1 Strategy - Mô tả hành động
Cấu trúc mô tả hành động thường gặp:
docs.text:
1. Một người thực hiện hành động: 

• A woman is walking down the hallway.
• The man is sitting at his desk.
• She is talking on the phone.
• He is writing in a notebook.

2. Nhiều người thực hiện hành động: 

• People are crossing the street.
• Workers are building a structure.
• Students are listening to a lecture.
• Customers are waiting in line.

3. Hành động với đồ vật: 

• She is holding a clipboard.
• He is carrying a briefcase.
• They are pushing a cart.
• The woman is wearing glasses.

  • Read /riːd/ vs Lead /liːd/

docs.title: 💡 4. Cụm từ hành động quan trọng
Active Work Phrases
docs.text: Cụm từ Nghĩa Ví dụ working on đang làm việc về She's working on a presentation. typing on đang gõ trên He's typing on his laptop. talking to đang nói chuyện với They're talking to clients. looking at đang nhìn vào She's looking at the screen. listening to đang nghe He's listening to instructions. writing in đang viết trong She's writing in her planner.

docs.text: Cụm từ Nghĩa Ví dụ walking toward đi về phía People are walking toward the building. climbing up leo lên Workers are climbing up the scaffolding. going down đi xuống She's going down the stairs. crossing over băng qua Pedestrians are crossing over the bridge. entering into đi vào Visitors are entering into the museum. exiting from thoát ra từ People are exiting from the theater.

docs.title: Interactive Phrases
docs.text: Cụm từ Nghĩa Ví dụ shaking hands with bắt tay với He's shaking hands with a client. pointing at chỉ vào She's pointing at the chart. reaching for với tay lấy He's reaching for a file. holding onto cầm chặt She's holding onto the railing. helping with giúp với Staff are helping with directions. assisting in hỗ trợ trong They're assisting in the move.

docs.title: Exercise A: Action Verb Forms
docs.text:
Complete with the correct Present Continuous form:

  1. The woman _ (walk) to her car.
  2. Two men _ (shake) hands in the lobby.
  3. She _ (type) on her computer keyboard.
  4. Workers _ (build) a new office complex.
  5. The customer _ (pay) for his purchase.
  6. Students _ (listen) to the professor.
  7. He _ (carry) boxes to the storage room.
  8. People _ (cross) the busy intersection.

Answer Key: 1. is walking 2. are shaking 3. is typing 4. are building 5. is paying 6. are listening 7. is carrying 8. are crossing

docs.title: Exercise B: Action Recognition
docs.text:
Match the action with the most likely TOEIC Part 1 description:

  1. Typing → A. The woman is operating office equipment.
  2. Shaking hands → B. People are greeting each other formally.
  3. Climbing → C. Workers are ascending the structure.
  4. Serving → D. The staff member is helping customers.
  5. Presenting → E. She is addressing the audience.

Answer Key: 1-A, 2-B, 3-C, 4-D, 5-E

docs.title: Exercise C: Part 1 Complete Descriptions
docs.text:
Choose the best description for each scenario:

Scenario 1: Office worker at computer A) The man works at his computer every day. B) The man is working on his computer. C) The man will work on his computer later. D) The man has worked on his computer.

Scenario 2: People in a meeting room A) Colleagues meet every Tuesday morning. B) Colleagues are meeting in the conference room. C) Colleagues will meet after lunch. D) Colleagues have met about the project.

Answer Key: 1-B (Present Continuous for what's happening now), 2-B

docs.title: DO:
docs.text: ✅ Use Present Continuous - Almost all Part 1 descriptions use "is/are + -ing" ✅ Be specific about the action - "typing" not just "using computer" ✅ Notice the object of action - what someone is holding, using, or interacting with ✅ Consider the setting - office actions, outdoor activities, etc.

docs.title: DON'T:
docs.text: ❌ Describe past or future - Only what's happening right now ❌ Guess emotions or intentions - "He looks happy" is not a good Part 1 answer ❌ Use complex actions - Simple, observable actions only ❌ Ignore prepositions - "walking to" vs "walking from" matters

docs.title: Office Setting Actions:
docs.text:
• Working: typing, writing, reading, printing, filing
  • Meeting: discussing, presenting, listening, taking notes

docs.title: Public Setting Actions:

  • Transportation: boarding, waiting, traveling

docs.title: Construction/Work Setting Actions:

  • Manual work: lifting, carrying, pushing, pulling

docs.title: a. Giới từ chỉ vị trí cơ bản (Basic Position Prepositions)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ on /ɑːn/ (prep) trên The book is on the table. in /ɪn/ (prep) trong She is in the office. at /æt/ (prep) tại They are meeting at the conference room. under /ˈʌn.dɚ/ (prep) dưới The cat is under the chair. above /əˈbʌv/ (prep) phía trên The clock hangs above the door. below /bɪˈloʊ/ (prep) phía dưới The parking garage is below ground level. over /ˈoʊ.vɚ/ (prep) bên trên A bridge spans over the river. behind /bɪˈhaɪnd/ (prep) phía sau The car is parked behind the building. in front of /ɪn frʌnt ʌv/ (prep) phía trước The receptionist sits in front of the entrance. beside /bɪˈsaɪd/ (prep) bên cạnh The lamp stands beside the sofa. next to /nekst tuː/ (prep) kế bên The printer is next to the computer. near /nɪr/ (prep) gần The café is near the train station. far from /fɑːr frʌm/ (prep) xa The hotel is far from the airport. between /bɪˈtwiːn/ (prep) giữa (2 vật) The office is between the bank and pharmacy. among /əˈmʌŋ/ (prep) giữa (nhiều vật) She stands among her colleagues.

docs.title: b. Vị trí trong không gian (Spatial Positions)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ inside /ɪnˈsaɪd/ (prep/adv) bên trong People are waiting inside the building. outside /ˌaʊtˈsaɪd/ (prep/adv) bên ngoài Workers are eating lunch outside. upstairs /ˌʌpˈsterz/ (adv) ở tầng trên The meeting room is upstairs. downstairs /ˌdaʊnˈsterz/ (adv) ở tầng dưới The cafeteria is downstairs. across /əˈkrɔːs/ (prep) đối diện The bank is across the street. along /əˈlɔːŋ/ (prep) dọc theo Trees line along the sidewalk. around /əˈraʊnd/ (prep) xung quanh Chairs are arranged around the table. through /θruː/ (prep) xuyên qua Light streams through the window. throughout /θruːˈaʊt/ (prep) khắp nơi Computers are used throughout the office. within /wɪˈðɪn/ (prep) trong phạm vi All equipment is within reach. beyond /bɪˈjɑːnd/ (prep) xa hơn The mountains extend beyond the horizon. against /əˈɡenst/ (prep) dựa vào The ladder leans against the wall. toward /təˈwɔːrd/ (prep) hướng về People are walking toward the exit. away from /əˈweɪ frʌm/ (prep) ra xa khỏi He moved away from the crowd.

docs.title: c. Địa điểm và khu vực (Places & Areas)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ corner /ˈkɔːr.nɚ/ (n) góc The coffee shop is on the corner. center /ˈsen.t̬ɚ/ (n) trung tâm The fountain sits in the center of the plaza. edge /edʒ/ (n) mép, rìa Tables are placed along the edge of the patio. side /saɪd/ (n) bên The entrance is on the left side. end /end/ (n) cuối The elevator is at the end of the hallway. middle /ˈmɪd.əl/ (n) giữa She sits in the middle of the row. top /tɑːp/ (n) đỉnh The flag waves at the top of the pole. bottom /ˈbɑː.t̬əm/ (n) đáy The signature goes at the bottom of the page. front /frʌnt/ (n) phía trước The receptionist desk is at the front. back /bæk/ (n) phía sau The storage room is in the back. entrance /ˈen.trəns/ (n) lối vào Visitors gather at the main entrance. exit /ˈeɡ.zɪt/ (n) lối ra The exit sign glows above the door. hallway /ˈhɔːl.weɪ/ (n) hành lang Employees walk through the hallway. lobby /ˈlɑː.bi/ (n) sảnh People wait in the hotel lobby. corridor /ˈkɔːr.ə.dɔːr/ (n) hành lang Offices line both sides of the corridor.

docs.title: d. Hướng di chuyển (Directions)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ left /left/ (n/adj/adv) trái Turn left at the intersection. right /raɪt/ (n/adj/adv) phải The elevator is on your right. straight /streɪt/ (adv) thẳng Go straight down this hallway. forward /ˈfɔːr.wɚd/ (adv) tiến lên Move forward in the line. backward /ˈbæk.wɚd/ (adv) lùi lại The car is backing backward into the space. up /ʌp/ (adv) lên Take the escalator up to the second floor. down /daʊn/ (adv) xuống Walk down the stairs to the basement. north /nɔːrθ/ (n/adv) hướng bắc The building faces north. south /saʊθ/ (n/adv) hướng nam Head south on Main Street. east /iːst/ (n/adv) hướng đông The sun rises in the east. west /west/ (n/adv) hướng tây The parking lot is on the west side. northeast /ˌnɔːrθˈiːst/ (n/adv) đông bắc The conference center is northeast of here. southeast /ˌsaʊθˈiːst/ (n/adv) đông nam Drive southeast toward the airport. northwest /ˌnɔːrθˈwest/ (n/adv) tây bắc The mountains lie to the northwest. southwest /ˌsaʊθˈwest/ (n/adv) tây nam The hotel is southwest of downtown.

docs.title: e. Mô tả không gian (Spatial Descriptions)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ adjacent /əˈdʒeɪ.sənt/ (adj) liền kề The conference room is adjacent to the office. opposite /ˈɑː.pə.zət/ (adj/prep) đối diện The restaurant is opposite the bank. parallel /ˈper.ə.lel/ (adj) song song The parking spaces run parallel to the building. perpendicular /ˌpɝː.pənˈdɪk.jə.lɚ/ (adj) vuông góc The hallway runs perpendicular to the main corridor. diagonal /daɪˈæɡ.ə.nəl/ (adj) chéo He walked diagonal across the plaza. horizontal /ˌhɔːr.əˈzɑːn.t̬əl/ (adj) ngang The shelves are mounted horizontally. vertical /ˈvɝː.t̬ə.kəl/ (adj) dọc The banner hangs vertically on the wall. central /ˈsen.trəl/ (adj) trung tâm The central courtyard has a fountain. remote /rɪˈmoʊt/ (adj) xa xôi The facility is in a remote location. accessible /əkˈses.ə.bəl/ (adj) có thể tiếp cận The building is wheelchair accessible. surrounding /səˈraʊn.dɪŋ/ (adj) xung quanh Trees beautify the surrounding area. nearby /ˈnɪrˌbaɪ/ (adj/adv) gần đó There's a café in the nearby shopping center.

docs.title: Cách sử dụng giới từ chỉ nơi chốn:
docs.text:
1. ON - Trên bề mặt: 

✅ The book is on the table.
✅ Pictures hang on the wall. 
✅ She works on the second floor.

2. IN - Bên trong một không gian: 

✅ He is in the office.
✅ Documents are in the filing cabinet.
✅ The meeting is in Room 205.

3. AT - Tại một điểm cụ thể: 

✅ They meet at the reception desk.
✅ The conference is at the hotel.
✅ She's waiting at the bus stop.

4. BESIDE vs NEXT TO: 

✅ The printer is beside/next to the computer. (Cùng nghĩa)
✅ She sits beside her colleague.

5. BETWEEN vs AMONG: 

✅ The office is between the bank and café. (giữa 2 địa điểm)
✅ She stands among her teammates. (giữa nhiều người)

docs.title: Common Mistakes (Lỗi thường gặp):
docs.text:
❌ The picture is in the wall. → ✅ The picture is on the wall.
❌ He works in the third floor. → ✅ He works on the third floor.
❌ Meet me in the corner. → ✅ Meet me at the corner.

docs.title: 🔍 3. TOEIC Part 1 Strategy - Mô tả vị trí
Cấu trúc mô tả vị trí thường gặp:
docs.text:
1. Vị trí của người: 

• A woman is standing beside the elevator.
• People are sitting around the conference table.
• The man is walking toward the entrance.
• Employees are gathered in the lobby.

2. Vị trí của đồ vật: 

• Computers are placed on each desk.
• Files are stored in the cabinet.
• A clock hangs above the doorway.
• Chairs are arranged around the table.

3. Quan hệ vị trí giữa các đối tượng: 

• The coffee shop is next to the bookstore.
• Parking spaces line both sides of the street.
• The building is located across from the park.
• Tables are positioned throughout the dining area.

docs.title: Những cụm từ quan trọng:
docs.text:
• At the corner of - tại góc của
  • In the center of - ở trung tâm của
  • Along the side of - dọc theo bên của
  • Throughout the area - khắp khu vực
  • Within the vicinity - trong vùng lân cận

docs.title: 💡 4. Cụm từ vị trí quan trọng
Office & Building Locations
docs.text: Cụm từ Nghĩa Ví dụ at the reception desk tại quầy lễ tân Visitors check in at the reception desk. in the conference room trong phòng họp The meeting is in the conference room. on the top floor ở tầng cao nhất Executive offices are on the top floor. in the basement trong tầng hầm Storage areas are in the basement. near the elevator gần thang máy The restrooms are near the elevator. across the hallway đối diện hành lang His office is across the hallway.

docs.title: Street & Outdoor Locations
docs.text: Cụm từ Nghĩa Ví dụ on the sidewalk trên vỉa hè People are walking on the sidewalk. at the intersection tại ngã tư Traffic lights control the intersection. across the street đối diện đường The bank is across the street. around the corner quanh góc The café is just around the corner. along the riverbank dọc bờ sông Trees are planted along the riverbank. in the parking lot trong bãi đậu xe Cars are parked in the parking lot.

docs.title: Relative Position Phrases
docs.text: Cụm từ Nghĩa Ví dụ in the foreground ở tiền cảnh Tables are visible in the foreground. in the background ở hậu cảnh Buildings appear in the background. to the left of bên trái của The printer is to the left of the computer. to the right of bên phải của The window is to the right of the door. in the distance ở xa Mountains are visible in the distance. up close ở gần The details are clear up close.

docs.title: Exercise A: Preposition Selection
docs.text:
Choose the correct preposition:

  1. The meeting will be held _____ (in/on/at) the conference room.
  2. Her office is _____ (in/on/at) the fifth floor.
  3. The reception desk is _____ (in/on/at) the main entrance.
  4. Files are organized _____ (in/on/at) alphabetical order.
  5. The parking garage is _____ (above/below/under) the building.
  6. She sits _____ (between/among/beside) her two colleagues.
  7. The café is _____ (across/through/along) from the library.
  8. Equipment is stored _____ (throughout/within/beyond) the facility.

Answer Key: 1. in, 2. on, 3. at, 4. in, 5. below, 6. between, 7. across, 8. throughout

docs.title: Exercise B: Location Description
docs.text:
Complete the TOEIC Part 1 style descriptions:

  1. People are sitting _ the conference table.
  2. The computer monitor is positioned _ the desk.
  3. A clock hangs _ the doorway.
  4. The elevator is located _ the end of the hallway.
  5. Visitors are waiting _ the lobby area.
  6. The parking lot extends _ the building.
  7. Office supplies are stored _ the cabinet.
  8. The restaurant is situated _ the hotel and bank.

Answer Key: 1. around, 2. on, 3. above, 4. at, 5. in, 6. behind, 7. in, 8. between

docs.title: Exercise C: Spatial Relationships
docs.text:
Match the situations with the best position descriptions:

Situations: A. Two buildings side by side B. A person walking to a destination C. Items scattered on a surface D. A group of people in a circle E. Something visible in the distance

Descriptions: 1. Objects are spread across the table. 2. The mountains appear in the background. 3. People are arranged around the meeting area. 4. The stores are located next to each other. 5. She is walking toward the entrance.

Answer Key: A-4, B-5, C-1, D-3, E-2

docs.title: DO:
docs.text: ✅ Be precise with prepositions - "on the table" vs "beside the table" ✅ Use correct spatial relationships - between (2 objects) vs among (3+ objects) ✅ Notice relative positions - left/right, front/back, up/down ✅ Describe what's clearly visible - don't assume hidden locations

docs.title: DON'T:
docs.text: ❌ Confuse similar prepositions - in/on/at have different uses ❌ Guess exact distances - use general terms like "near" or "far" ❌ Over-complicate descriptions - simple, clear position statements work best ❌ Ignore perspective - consider the viewpoint of the photograph

docs.title: Day 57: Animals & Nature (Động vật và Thiên nhiên)
Day 57: Animals & Nature (Động vật và Thiên nhiên)
docs.text: Chào mừng bạn đến với Ngày 57! Hôm nay chúng ta tiếp tục PHASE 6: LISTENING SPECIFIC với chủ đề Animals & Nature (Động vật và Thiên nhiên). Bài học này tập trung vào từ vựng mô tả động vật, thực vật và các yếu tố tự nhiên thường xuất hiện trong Part 1 của TOEIC. Đây là chủ đề quan trọng giúp bạn nhận diện và mô tả các cảnh quan tự nhiên và đô thị.

docs.title: 🎯 Mục tiêu bài học
docs.text:
• Nắm vững 60+ từ vựng về động vật, thực vật và thiên nhiên trong TOEIC Part 1.
  • Luyện nghe (Listening): Phân biệt từ vựng về tự nhiên và môi trường (Part 1).
  • Luyện đọc (Reading): Hiểu từ vựng thiên nhiên trong văn bản (Part 5-7).
  • Ngữ pháp: Ôn tập There is/There are và Passive Voice cho mô tả tự nhiên.

docs.title: ⏰ Phân bổ thời gian (1.5 - 2 giờ)
docs.text:
1. Từ vựng (35 phút): Học từ mới về động vật và thiên nhiên.
  2. Grammar Focus (15 phút): There is/are và Passive Voice.
  3. TOEIC Part 1 Focus (20 phút): Chiến lược mô tả cảnh tự nhiên.
  4. Luyện tập (30 phút): Làm bài tập nature description.
  5. Review & Homework (10 phút): Tổng kết và bài tập về nhà.

docs.title: a. Động vật thường gặp (Common Animals)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ bird /bɜːrd/ (n) chim Birds are flying overhead. dog /dɔːɡ/ (n) chó A dog is running in the park. cat /kæt/ (n) mèo The cat is sitting on the fence. horse /hɔːrs/ (n) ngựa Horses are grazing in the field. cow /kaʊ/ (n) bò Cows are scattered across the pasture. sheep /ʃiːp/ (n) cừu Sheep are gathered near the barn. pig /pɪɡ/ (n) heo Pigs are roaming in the farmyard. duck /dʌk/ (n) vịt Ducks are swimming in the pond. goose /ɡuːs/ (n) ngỗng Geese are walking along the shore. chicken /ˈtʃɪk.ən/ (n) gà Chickens are pecking at seeds. fish /fɪʃ/ (n) cá Fish are visible in the clear water. butterfly /ˈbʌt.ɚ.flaɪ/ (n) bướm Butterflies flutter among the flowers. bee /biː/ (n) ong Bees are buzzing around the hive. squirrel /ˈskwɜː.rəl/ (n) sóc Squirrels are climbing the oak tree. rabbit /ˈræb.ɪt/ (n) thỏ Rabbits hop across the meadow.

docs.title: b. Cây cối và thực vật (Trees & Plants)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ tree /triː/ (n) cây Trees line both sides of the avenue. bush /bʊʃ/ (n) bụi cây Flowering bushes border the pathway. shrub /ʃrʌb/ (n) cây bụi Decorative shrubs surround the building. grass /ɡræs/ (n) cỏ Green grass covers the entire lawn. lawn /lɔːn/ (n) bãi cỏ The lawn is freshly mowed and manicured. flower /ˈflaʊ.ɚ/ (n) hoa Colorful flowers bloom in the garden. plant /plænt/ (n) cây trồng Potted plants decorate the patio. leaf /liːf/ (n) lá Autumn leaves fall from the branches. branch /bræntʃ/ (n) cành Birds perch on the sturdy branches. trunk /trʌŋk/ (n) thân cây The massive trunk supports the canopy. root /ruːt/ (n) rễ cây Exposed roots create natural steps. seed /siːd/ (n) hạt giống Seeds are scattered across the soil. fruit /fruːt/ (n) quả Ripe fruit hangs from the trees. vegetable /ˈvedʒ.tə.bəl/ (n) rau Fresh vegetables grow in rows. herb /ɜːrb/ (n) thảo mộc Aromatic herbs fill the garden beds. vine /vaɪn/ (n) dây leo Climbing vines cover the trellis. moss /mɔːs/ (n) rêu Green moss grows on the stone wall.

docs.title: c. Địa hình và cảnh quan (Landscape & Terrain)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ mountain /ˈmaʊn.tən/ (n) núi Mountains rise in the distance. hill /hɪl/ (n) đồi Rolling hills stretch to the horizon. valley /ˈvæl.i/ (n) thung lũng The valley is filled with morning mist. forest /ˈfɔːr.ɪst/ (n) rừng Dense forest covers the mountainside. woods /wʊdz/ (n) rừng nhỏ A path winds through the woods. field /fiːld/ (n) đồng ruộng Golden wheat sways in the field. meadow /ˈmed.oʊ/ (n) đồng cỏ Wildflowers dot the open meadow. pasture /ˈpæs.tʃɚ/ (n) đồng cỏ chăn nuôi Cattle graze in the green pasture. farm /fɑːrm/ (n) trang trại The farm spans several acres. garden /ˈɡɑːr.dən/ (n) vườn The botanical garden attracts visitors. park /pɑːrk/ (n) công viên Families gather in the city park. lake /leɪk/ (n) hồ The lake reflects the surrounding trees. pond /pɑːnd/ (n) ao Ducks swim peacefully in the pond. river /ˈrɪv.ɚ/ (n) sông The river flows toward the ocean. stream /striːm/ (n) suối A clear stream bubbles over rocks. beach /biːtʃ/ (n) bãi biển Waves crash onto the sandy beach. shore /ʃɔːr/ (n) bờ Seashells wash up on the shore. coast /koʊst/ (n) bờ biển The rocky coast faces the open sea.

docs.title: d. Thời tiết và khí hậu (Weather & Climate)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ sun /sʌn/ (n) mặt trời The sun shines brightly overhead. sunshine /ˈsʌn.ʃaɪn/ (n) ánh nắng Warm sunshine filters through leaves. cloud /klaʊd/ (n) mây White clouds drift across the sky. sky /skaɪ/ (n) bầu trời The clear blue sky stretches endlessly. rain /reɪn/ (n/v) mưa Light rain dampens the garden. snow /snoʊ/ (n/v) tuyết Fresh snow covers the mountain peaks. wind /wɪnd/ (n) gió Strong winds bend the tree branches. breeze /briːz/ (n) gió nhẹ A gentle breeze rustles the leaves. storm /stɔːrm/ (n) bão The approaching storm darkens the sky. fog /fɔːɡ/ (n) sương mù Thick fog obscures the distant hills. mist /mɪst/ (n) sương Morning mist rises from the lake. frost /frɔːst/ (n) sương giá Frost covers the grass at dawn. ice /aɪs/ (n) băng Ice forms on the pond's surface. rainbow /ˈreɪn.boʊ/ (n) cầu vồng A rainbow arcs across the sky. lightning /ˈlaɪt.nɪŋ/ (n) sét Lightning illuminates the storm clouds. thunder /ˈθʌn.dɚ/ (n) sấm Thunder echoes through the valley.

docs.title: e. Môi trường và cảnh quan đô thị (Urban Nature)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ garden bed /ˈɡɑːr.dən bed/ (n) luống hoa Colorful flowers fill the garden beds. flowerbed /ˈflaʊ.ɚ.bed/ (n) luống hoa Well-maintained flowerbeds line the walkway. fountain /ˈfaʊn.tən/ (n) đài phun nước Water shoots high from the central fountain. pond /pɑːnd/ (n) ao nhân tạo Koi fish swim in the decorative pond. waterfall /ˈwɔː.t̬ɚ.fɔːl/ (n) thác nước A small waterfall cascades over rocks. greenhouse /ˈɡriːn.haʊs/ (n) nhà kính Tropical plants thrive in the greenhouse. conservatory /kənˈsɜːr.və.tɔːr.i/ (n) nhà kính The conservatory houses rare orchids. botanical garden /bəˈtæn.ɪ.kəl ˈɡɑːr.dən/ (n) vườn thực vật The botanical garden displays native species. arboretum /ˌɑːr.bəˈriː.t̬əm/ (n) vườn cây The arboretum features trees from worldwide. nature trail /ˈneɪ.tʃɚ treɪl/ (n) đường mòn tự nhiên Hikers follow the marked nature trail. picnic area /ˈpɪk.nɪk ˈer.i.ə/ (n) khu picnic Families enjoy lunch in the picnic area. playground /ˈpleɪ.ɡraʊnd/ (n) sân chơi Children play on the modern playground. gazebo /ɡəˈziː.boʊ/ (n) nhà lều sân vườn The wedding ceremony was held in the gazebo. pergola /ˈpɜːr.ɡə.lə/ (n) giàn leo Grapevines climb the wooden pergola. trellis /ˈtrel.ɪs/ (n) giàn leo Roses bloom along the garden trellis.

docs.title: There is/There are - Mô tả sự tồn tại:
docs.text:
Cấu trúc: - There is + singular noun - There are + plural noun

Ví dụ: 

✅ There is a lake in the center of the park.
✅ There are several trees along the pathway.
✅ There are many flowers blooming in the garden.
✅ There is a small stream running through the property.

docs.title: Passive Voice - Mô tả trạng thái tự nhiên:
docs.text:
Cấu trúc: Subject + be + past participle

Ví dụ: 

✅ The lawn is well-maintained.
✅ Trees are planted throughout the area.
✅ The garden is surrounded by a stone wall.
✅ Flowers are arranged in colorful displays.

docs.title: Present Participle - Mô tả hành động liên tục:
docs.text:
Ví dụ: 

✅ Birds are singing in the trees.
✅ Water is flowing over the rocks.
✅ Leaves are falling from the branches.
✅ Bees are buzzing around the flowers.

docs.title: Exercise C: Part 1 Descriptions
docs.text:
Choose the best TOEIC Part 1 description:

Scenario 1: Park scene with people and ducks A) People are feeding bread to the ducks. B) Ducks are swimming in the park pond. C) The park has many visitors today. D) Everyone enjoys watching the wildlife.

Scenario 2: Garden with blooming flowers A) The gardener planted these flowers last spring. B) Flowers are blooming throughout the garden. C) These flowers will attract many bees. D) The garden needs more colorful plants.

Answer Key: 1-B (describes what's visible now), 2-B (present continuous, observable)

docs.title: DO:
docs.text: ✅ Focus on visible elements - animals, plants, landscapes you can see ✅ Use present continuous - what's happening right now in nature ✅ Be specific about locations - "in the garden," "by the lake," "on the mountain" ✅ Notice natural processes - flowing, growing, blooming, falling

docs.title: DON'T:
docs.text: ❌ Assume seasons or time - don't guess if it's spring or summer ❌ Describe sounds you can't hear - birds "singing" may not be audible ❌ Add emotional descriptions - "beautiful flowers" is subjective ❌ Guess animal behavior - only describe what's clearly visible

docs.title: a. Câu hỏi chỉ đường cơ bản (Basic Direction Questions)
docs.text: Câu hỏi Phiên âm Loại Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ Where is...? /wer ɪz/ WH-Q ...ở đâu? Where is the nearest bank? How do I get to...? /haʊ duː aɪ ɡet tuː/ WH-Q Làm sao để đến...? How do I get to the train station? Could you tell me where...? /kʊd juː tel miː wer/ Polite Q Bạn có thể cho tôi biết...ở đâu? Could you tell me where the restroom is? Do you know where...? /duː juː noʊ wer/ Y/N Q Bạn có biết...ở đâu không? Do you know where the conference room is? Can you direct me to...? /kæn juː dəˈrekt miː tuː/ Y/N Q Bạn có thể chỉ đường đến...? Can you direct me to the parking garage? Which way to...? /wɪtʃ weɪ tuː/ WH-Q Đường nào đến...? Which way to the main entrance? Is there a ... nearby? /ɪz ðer ə ... ˈnɪrˌbaɪ/ Y/N Q Có...nào gần đây không? Is there a coffee shop nearby? How far is...? /haʊ fɑːr ɪz/ WH-Q ...cách đây bao xa? How far is the airport from here? Am I going the right way? /æm aɪ ˈɡoʊɪŋ ðə raɪt weɪ/ Y/N Q Tôi đang đi đúng đường không? Am I going the right way to downtown? Could you give me directions? /kʊd juː ɡɪv miː dəˈrekʃənz/ Request Bạn có thể chỉ đường cho tôi? Could you give me directions to the hotel?

docs.title: b. Câu trả lời chỉ đường (Direction Responses)
docs.text: Cụm từ chỉ đường Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ Go straight /ɡoʊ streɪt/ Imperative Đi thẳng Go straight for two blocks. Turn left/right /tɜːrn left/raɪt/ Imperative Rẽ trái/phải Turn right at the traffic light. Take the first/second... /teɪk ðə fɜːrst/ˈsekənd/ Imperative Rẽ thứ nhất/thứ hai... Take the second left after the bridge. It's on your left/right /ɪts ɑːn jʊr left/raɪt/ Location Nó ở bên trái/phải của bạn The bank is on your right. Walk down this street /wɔːk daʊn ðɪs striːt/ Imperative Đi xuống con đường này Walk down this street until you see a fountain. Head north/south /hed nɔːrθ/saʊθ/ Imperative Hướng bắc/nam Head south on Main Street. Follow the signs /ˈfɑːloʊ ðə saɪnz/ Imperative Theo các biển báo Follow the signs to the parking area. You can't miss it /juː kænt mɪs ɪt/ Assurance Bạn sẽ không thể bỏ lỡ It's a big red building. You can't miss it. It's within walking distance /ɪts wɪˈðɪn ˈwɔːkɪŋ ˈdɪstəns/ Description Trong tầm đi bộ The restaurant is within walking distance. Take the elevator to... /teɪk ði ˈeləˌveɪt̬ər tuː/ Imperative Đi thang máy đến... Take the elevator to the third floor.

docs.title: c. Địa điểm tham chiếu (Reference Points)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ intersection /ˌɪntərˈsekʃən/ (n) ngã tư Turn left at the next intersection. traffic light /ˈtræfɪk laɪt/ (n) đèn giao thông Stop at the traffic light. crosswalk /ˈkrɔːswɔːk/ (n) vạch sang đường Use the crosswalk to cross safely. corner /ˈkɔːrnər/ (n) góc đường The pharmacy is on the corner. block /blɑːk/ (n) tòa nhà/khối It's three blocks from here. landmark /ˈlændmɑːrk/ (n) địa danh The statue is a well-known landmark. bridge /brɪdʒ/ (n) cây cầu Cross the bridge and turn right. underpass /ˈʌndərpæs/ (n) đường hầm Take the underpass to avoid traffic. overpass /ˈoʊvərpæs/ (n) cầu vượt The office building is near the overpass. roundabout /ˈraʊndəbaʊt/ (n) bùng binh Exit the roundabout at the second exit. fork in the road /fɔːrk ɪn ðə roʊd/ (n) ngã ba Take the left fork in the road. dead end /ded end/ (n) đường cụt This street is a dead end. one-way street /wʌn weɪ striːt/ (n) đường một chiều Be careful, this is a one-way street. sidewalk /ˈsaɪdwɔːk/ (n) vỉa hè Stay on the sidewalk for safety. parking lot /ˈpɑːrkɪŋ lɑːt/ (n) bãi đậu xe The parking lot is behind the building.

docs.title: d. Khoảng cách và thời gian (Distance & Time)
docs.text: Cụm từ Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ a few minutes' walk /ə fjuː ˈmɪnɪts wɔːk/ (n) vài phút đi bộ It's just a few minutes' walk. five-minute drive /faɪv ˈmɪnɪt draɪv/ (n) 5 phút lái xe It's about a five-minute drive. walking distance /ˈwɔːkɪŋ ˈdɪstəns/ (n) khoảng cách đi bộ Everything is within walking distance. just around the corner /dʒʌst əˈraʊnd ðə ˈkɔːrnər/ (prep) chỉ quanh góc The café is just around the corner. two blocks away /tuː blɑːks əˈweɪ/ (prep) cách 2 tòa nhà The library is two blocks away. across the street /əˈkrɔːs ðə striːt/ (prep) đối diện đường The bank is across the street. down the hall /daʊn ðə hɔːl/ (prep) cuối hành lang The restroom is down the hall. up the stairs /ʌp ðə sterz/ (prep) lên cầu thang The office is up the stairs. on the same floor /ɑːn ðə seɪm flɔːr/ (prep) cùng tầng The meeting room is on the same floor. next building over /nekst ˈbɪldɪŋ ˈoʊvər/ (prep) tòa nhà bên cạnh Try the next building over.

docs.title: e. Động từ chỉ đường (Direction Verbs)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ proceed /prəˈsiːd/ (v) tiếp tục đi Proceed straight until you reach the plaza. continue /kənˈtɪnjuː/ (v) tiếp tục Continue down this road for half a mile. cross /krɔːs/ (v) băng qua Cross the street at the pedestrian crossing. pass /pæs/ (v) đi qua Pass the fountain and keep walking. exit /ˈeɡzɪt/ (v) thoát ra Exit the building through the main door. enter /ˈentər/ (v) vào Enter the building and take the elevator. approach /əˈproʊtʃ/ (v) tiến đến As you approach the intersection, slow down. bear /ber/ (v) hướng về Bear right after the traffic circle. veer /vɪr/ (v) rẽ nhẹ Veer left when you see the gas station. make a U-turn /meɪk ə juː tɜːrn/ (v) quay đầu xe Make a U-turn at the next safe opportunity. double back /ˈdʌbəl bæk/ (v) quay ngược lại You'll need to double back to Main Street. backtrack /ˈbæktræk/ (v) quay lại If you see the museum, you've gone too far—backtrack.

docs.title: Các dạng câu hỏi chỉ đường thường gặp:
docs.text:
1. WH-Questions (Where, How, Which): 

Q: Where is the nearest subway station?
✅ A: It's two blocks down on your right.
❌ B: Yes, there is one nearby.
❌ C: I take the subway every day.

2. Yes/No Questions: 

Q: Do you know where the conference room is?
✅ A: Yes, it's on the second floor.
❌ B: The conference starts at 2 PM.
❌ C: Where did you put the materials?

3. Polite Requests: 

Q: Could you tell me how to get to the parking garage?
✅ A: Sure, take the elevator down to B1.
❌ B: The parking fee is $5 per hour.
❌ C: I don't have a car.

docs.title: Common Wrong Answer Types (Các dạng đáp án sai):
docs.text:
• Irrelevant Information: Thông tin không liên quan
  • Question with Question: Trả lời câu hỏi bằng câu hỏi khác
  • Wrong Focus: Tập trung sai chủ đề

docs.title: 💡 3. Mẫu hội thoại thường gặp (Common Patterns)
Pattern 1: Simple Location Query
docs.text:
A: Excuse me, where is the elevator?
B: It's at the end of this hallway, on your left.
A: Thank you very much.
B: You're welcome. Have a good day.

docs.title: Pattern 2: Detailed Directions
docs.text:
A: Could you help me find the Human Resources office?
B: Sure. Take the elevator to the third floor, turn right, and it's the second door on your left.
A: Third floor, turn right, second door. Got it. Thanks!
B: No problem. They should be open until 5 PM.

docs.title: Pattern 3: Distance and Time Information
docs.text:
A: How far is the train station from here?
B: It's about a 10-minute walk. Just head straight down this street.
A: Is it easy to find?
B: Very easy. You can't miss it—there's a big sign.

docs.title: Pattern 4: Alternative Suggestions
docs.text:
A: Is there a restaurant nearby?
B: There's a café on the ground floor, or if you want more options, there's a food court two blocks away.
A: Which one would you recommend?
B: The food court has more variety, but the café is much closer.

docs.title: Exercise A: Question-Response Matching
docs.text:
Match each question with the most appropriate response:

Questions: 1. Where is the nearest ATM? 2. How do I get to the conference room? 3. Is there a coffee shop around here? 4. Could you direct me to the parking garage? 5. Do you know if the library is open?

Responses: A. Yes, there's one on the first floor. B. It should be open until 9 PM. C. Take the elevator to the basement level. D. Go up to the second floor and turn left. E. There's one across the street from the bank.

Answer Key: 1-E, 2-D, 3-A, 4-C, 5-B

docs.text:

  1. _ straight down this hallway until you reach the elevator.
  2. _ left at the traffic light and continue for two blocks.
  3. The office is _ your right, just past the reception desk.
  4. _ the stairs to the second floor.
  5. You'll need to _ the street at the crosswalk.
  6. _ the signs to the parking area.
  7. It's _ walking distance from here.
  8. The restaurant is just _ the corner.

Answer Key: 1. Go, 2. Turn, 3. on, 4. Take/Go up, 5. cross, 6. Follow, 7. within, 8. around

docs.title: Exercise C: Identify the Wrong Response
docs.text:
Choose which response does NOT appropriately answer the question:

Q: Could you tell me where the restroom is? A. It's down the hall on your left. B. There's one on every floor. C. What time does the meeting start? D. Yes, go straight and turn right.

Answer: C (irrelevant - asks about meeting time instead of giving directions)

docs.title: DO:
docs.text: ✅ Listen for question words - Where, How, Which way ✅ Focus on location/direction content - Ignore irrelevant details ✅ Match question type with response type - WH-Q needs specific info ✅ Pay attention to polite language - "Could you," "Would you mind"

docs.title: DON'T:
docs.text: ❌ Choose responses about time when asked about location ❌ Select answers that ask another question ❌ Pick responses about cost/schedule for direction questions ❌ Fall for answers with similar-sounding words but wrong meaning

docs.title: Response Selection Mistakes:
docs.text:

❌ Q: "How do I get to...?" A: "How much does it cost?" (question for question)  
❌ Q: "Is there a...?" A: "I never go there" (personal opinion, not helpful)

docs.title: a. Câu hỏi về thời gian (Time Questions)
docs.text: Câu hỏi Phiên âm Loại Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ What time...? /wʌt taɪm/ WH-Q Mấy giờ...? What time does the meeting start? When is...? /wen ɪz/ WH-Q Khi nào...? When is the deadline for this project? How long...? /haʊ lɔːŋ/ WH-Q Bao lâu...? How long will the presentation take? Until when...? /ənˈtɪl wen/ WH-Q Đến khi nào...? Until when is the office open? By what time...? /baɪ wʌt taɪm/ WH-Q Trước mấy giờ...? By what time should I submit the report? Are you free at...? /ɑːr juː friː æt/ Y/N Q Bạn rảnh lúc...không? Are you free at 3 PM tomorrow? Do you have time for...? /duː juː hæv taɪm fɔːr/ Y/N Q Bạn có thời gian cho...? Do you have time for a quick meeting? Can we reschedule...? /kæn wiː riːˈskedʒuːl/ Y/N Q Chúng ta có thể dời lại...? Can we reschedule the appointment? Is it too late to...? /ɪz ɪt tuː leɪt tuː/ Y/N Q Có quá muộn để...? Is it too late to change the time? Would you mind if...? /wʊd juː maɪnd ɪf/ Polite Q Bạn có phiền không nếu...? Would you mind if we started earlier?

docs.title: b. Thời gian trong ngày (Times of Day)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ morning /ˈmɔːrnɪŋ/ (n) buổi sáng The meeting is scheduled for this morning. afternoon /ˌæftərˈnuːn/ (n) buổi chiều I have a doctor's appointment this afternoon. evening /ˈiːvnɪŋ/ (n) buổi tối The event starts at 6 PM this evening. night /naɪt/ (n) ban đêm The flight arrives late at night. dawn /dɔːn/ (n) bình minh The conference call is scheduled at dawn. dusk /dʌsk/ (n) hoàng hôn We'll wrap up by dusk. midnight /ˈmɪdnaɪt/ (n) nửa đêm The deadline is midnight tonight. noon /nuːn/ (n) trưa Let's meet for lunch at noon. rush hour /rʌʃ aʊər/ (n) giờ cao điểm Avoid traveling during rush hour. business hours /ˈbɪznəs aʊərz/ (n) giờ làm việc Call during business hours only. office hours /ˈɔːfɪs aʊərz/ (n) giờ văn phòng My office hours are 9 to 5. break time /breɪk taɪm/ (n) giờ nghỉ I'll talk to you during break time. lunchtime /ˈlʌntʃtaɪm/ (n) giờ ăn trưa The cafeteria is crowded at lunchtime.

docs.title: c. Ngày và tuần (Days & Weeks)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ today /təˈdeɪ/ (n/adv) hôm nay Today's schedule is packed with meetings. tomorrow /təˈmɔːroʊ/ (n/adv) ngày mai Tomorrow's presentation has been postponed. yesterday /ˈjestərdeɪ/ (n/adv) hôm qua Yesterday's meeting was very productive. the day after tomorrow /ðə deɪ ˈæftər təˈmɔːroʊ/ (n) ngày mốt The report is due the day after tomorrow. the day before yesterday /ðə deɪ bɪˈfɔːr ˈjestərdeɪ/ (n) hôm kia I submitted the application the day before yesterday. weekday /ˈwiːkdeɪ/ (n) ngày trong tuần This offer is valid on weekdays only. weekend /ˈwiːkend/ (n) cuối tuần I prefer not to work on weekends. this week /ðɪs wiːk/ (n) tuần này This week's agenda includes three presentations. next week /nekst wiːk/ (n) tuần sau Next week will be much busier. last week /læst wiːk/ (n) tuần trước Last week's sales figures were impressive. fortnight /ˈfɔːrtnaɪt/ (n) hai tuần The project will take a fortnight to complete. biweekly /baɪˈwiːkli/ (adj/adv) hai tuần một lần We have biweekly team meetings.

docs.title: d. Tháng và năm (Months & Years)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ this month /ðɪs mʌnθ/ (n) tháng này This month's budget has been approved. next month /nekst mʌnθ/ (n) tháng sau Next month's conference is in Tokyo. last month /læst mʌnθ/ (n) tháng trước Last month's performance exceeded expectations. quarterly /ˈkwɔːrtərli/ (adj/adv) theo quý We review budgets quarterly. annually /ˈænjuəli/ (adv) hàng năm The contract is renewed annually. fiscal year /ˈfɪskəl jɪr/ (n) năm tài chính The fiscal year ends in March. calendar year /ˈkæləndər jɪr/ (n) năm dương lịch We follow the calendar year schedule. semester /səˈmestər/ (n) học kỳ This semester's courses are challenging. quarter /ˈkwɔːrtər/ (n) quý Sales targets are set each quarter. deadline /ˈdedlaɪn/ (n) hạn chót The project deadline is next Friday. due date /duː deɪt/ (n) ngày đến hạn When is the due date for submissions? expiration date /ˌekspəˈreɪʃən deɪt/ (n) ngày hết hạn Check the expiration date on your ID.

docs.title: e. Tần suất và thời gian (Frequency & Duration)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ always /ˈɔːlweɪz/ (adv) luôn luôn I always arrive early to meetings. usually /ˈjuːʒuəli/ (adv) thường thường Usually, we finish by 5 PM. often /ˈɔːfən/ (adv) thường xuyên We often work late on Fridays. sometimes /ˈsʌmtaɪmz/ (adv) đôi khi Sometimes the meetings run overtime. rarely /ˈrerli/ (adv) hiếm khi I rarely work on weekends. never /ˈnevər/ (adv) không bao giờ Never schedule meetings after 6 PM. frequently /ˈfriːkwəntli/ (adv) thường xuyên We frequently update our procedures. occasionally /əˈkeɪʒənəli/ (adv) thỉnh thoảng Occasionally, we have video conferences. regularly /ˈreɡjələrli/ (adv) đều đặn We meet regularly every Tuesday. daily /ˈdeɪli/ (adj/adv) hàng ngày Daily reports are submitted by noon. weekly /ˈwiːkli/ (adj/adv) hàng tuần Weekly staff meetings are mandatory. monthly /ˈmʌnθli/ (adj/adv) hàng tháng Monthly reviews help track progress. temporarily /ˌtempəˈrerəli/ (adv) tạm thời The office is temporarily closed. permanently /ˈpɜːrmənəntli/ (adv) vĩnh viễn The policy change is permanently in effect. indefinitely /ɪnˈdefənətli/ (adv) không xác định The project is postponed indefinitely.

docs.title: f. Động từ về lịch trình (Schedule Verbs)
docs.text: Từ vựng Phiên âm Loại từ Nghĩa tiếng Việt Ví dụ schedule /ˈskedʒuːl/ (v) lên lịch I need to schedule a meeting with HR. reschedule /riːˈskedʒuːl/ (v) dời lịch Can we reschedule for next week? postpone /poʊstˈpoʊn/ (v) hoãn lại We had to postpone the launch. cancel /ˈkænsəl/ (v) hủy bỏ Unfortunately, we must cancel today's session. arrange /əˈreɪndʒ/ (v) sắp xếp I'll arrange a time that works for everyone. confirm /kənˈfɜːrm/ (v) xác nhận Please confirm your attendance. extend /ɪkˈstend/ (v) kéo dài We need to extend the deadline. advance /ədˈvæns/ (v) đưa lên trước Let's advance the meeting by an hour. delay /dɪˈleɪ/ (v) trì hoãn Bad weather will delay our departure. prioritize /praɪˈɔːrəˌtaɪz/ (v) ưu tiên We need to prioritize urgent tasks. coordinate /koʊˈɔːrdəneɪt/ (v) phối hợp I'll coordinate everyone's schedules. overlap /ˈoʊvərlæp/ (v) trùng lặp Our meetings overlap by 15 minutes. synchronize /ˈsɪŋkrənaɪz/ (v) đồng bộ Let's synchronize our calendars.

docs.title: Các dạng câu hỏi về thời gian thường gặp:
docs.text:
1. "What time" Questions: 

Q: What time does the conference start?
✅ A: It begins at 9 AM sharp.
❌ B: The conference room is on the third floor.
❌ C: About 200 people will attend.

2. "When" Questions: 

Q: When is the project deadline?
✅ A: It's due next Friday.
❌ B: The project manager will decide.
❌ C: How long have you been working on it?

3. "How long" Questions: 

Q: How long will the meeting last?
✅ A: About two hours.
❌ B: In the main conference room.
❌ C: All department heads will attend.

4. Scheduling Questions: 

Q: Are you available Thursday morning?
✅ A: Yes, I'm free until 11 AM.
❌ B: Thursday is my favorite day.
❌ C: What do you need to discuss?

docs.title: Common Wrong Answer Patterns:
docs.text:
• Location instead of Time: "Where" information for "When" questions
  • People instead of Time: "Who" information for time questions
  • Method instead of Duration: "How" (method) for "How long" questions

docs.title: 💡 3. Mẫu hội thoại thường gặp (Common Patterns)
Pattern 1: Meeting Scheduling
docs.text:
A: When are you free for our project discussion?
B: I have an opening Thursday afternoon after 2 PM.
A: Perfect. How about 2:30?
B: That works. I'll send a calendar invitation.

docs.title: Pattern 2: Deadline Inquiry
docs.text:
A: What's the deadline for the quarterly report?
B: It's due by the end of this month.
A: That gives us two weeks to prepare.
B: Yes, but remember, we need approval time too.

docs.title: Pattern 3: Rescheduling Request
docs.text:
A: I'm sorry, but I need to reschedule our meeting.
B: No problem. When would work better for you?
A: Could we move it to Friday morning?
B: Friday morning is perfect. Same time?

docs.title: Pattern 4: Time Confirmation
docs.text:
A: Just to confirm, the presentation is at 3 PM?
B: Actually, it's been moved to 3:30.
A: Thanks for letting me know. I'll update my calendar.
B: I'll send the revised agenda shortly.

docs.title: Exercise A: Time Question Response
docs.text:
Choose the best response for each question:

  1. Q: What time should I arrive tomorrow? A. The office is downtown. B. Please be there by 9 AM. C. I'll be working late tonight.

  2. Q: How long does the training session last? A. It's in the conference room. B. About three hours. C. The trainer is very experienced.

  3. Q: When is your next available appointment? A. I have an opening Tuesday at 2 PM. B. My office is on the fifth floor. C. Appointments cost $50 each.

  4. Q: Can we reschedule for next week? A. Next week is very busy. B. Yes, how about Wednesday morning? C. Why do you want to change it?

Answer Key: 1-B, 2-B, 3-A, 4-B

docs.title: Exercise B: Complete the Schedule Conversation
docs.text:
Fill in the blanks with appropriate time expressions:

A: I need to schedule a meeting with the design team. B: When would you _ to meet? A: _ about Thursday afternoon? B: Thursday afternoon is _ for me. What time? A: _ 2 PM work for everyone? B: Let me check. Yes, 2 PM _ fine. A: Great! I'll _ a calendar invitation. B: Perfect. _ long do you expect it to last? A: _ an hour should be enough.

Answer Key: prefer/like, How, available/free, Would/Does, sounds/looks, send, How, About/Around

docs.title: Exercise C: Identify the Question Type
docs.text:
Match each question with its focus:

Questions: 1. What time does the store close? 2. How long have you been waiting? 3. When did you submit the application? 4. Are you free this evening? 5. Until when is the promotion valid?

Focus Areas: A. Duration from past to now B. Specific closing time C. End time/deadline D. Availability inquiry E. Past specific time

Answer Key: 1-B, 2-A, 3-E, 4-D, 5-C

docs.title: DO:
docs.text: ✅ Listen for time-related question words - What time, When, How long ✅ Focus on time information in responses - Hours, days, dates ✅ Pay attention to prepositions - at, on, in, by, until ✅ Notice tense consistency - Past questions need past responses

docs.title: DON'T:
docs.text: ❌ Choose location responses for time questions ❌ Select cost information when asked about timing ❌ Pick responses that ask questions back ❌ Ignore temporal context clues

docs.title: Listening Confusions:
docs.text:
❌ "Thirteen" (13) vs "Thirty" (30)
❌ "Fifteen" (15) vs "Fifty" (50)

docs.title: Response Mismatches:
docs.text:
❌ Q: "What time...?" A: "In the conference room" (place, not time)
❌ Q: "How long...?" A: "With the whole team" (people, not duration)
❌ Q: "When...?" A: "$50 per hour" (cost, not time)

docs.title: Preposition Errors:
docs.text:
❌ "On 3 o'clock" → ✅ "At 3 o'clock"
❌ "In Monday" → ✅ "On Monday"
